intent: Edit lsysviz/cli.py to add command-line arguments and wire them through the expand, turtle, and render modules to produce a PNG from L-system parameters.
notes: Edit ONLY lsysviz/cli.py. Keep the existing --version flag. Add these required arguments to build_parser(): --axiom (str, required), --rule (str, repeatable via action='append', required, format 'SYMBOL=REPLACEMENT' e.g. 'F=FF+F'), --iterations (int, required), --angle (float, required, degrees), --step (float, required, step length), --output (str, required, output PNG path). Add optional: --width (int, default 800), --height (int, default 600). In main(), after parsing: if --version, print version and return 0. Otherwise: parse each --rule string by splitting on the first '=' to build a rules dict, construct a Grammar, call expand(), call interpret(), call render_to_png(), return 0. All other files are context-only — do NOT modify them.
